heroTitle: Experience the road like never before
heroSubtitle: Turn every journey into a story — clean cars, simple booking, pure freedom. Drive with confidence, explore new places, and make memories that last a lifetime.
availabilityText: Always ready when you are — choose from a wide range of cars, available anytime, anywhere.
comfortText: Enjoy every ride with modern, well-maintained vehicles built for safety, space, and smooth driving.
savingsText: Drive more and spend less — affordable prices with no hidden fees or surprises.
chooseCarSectionTitle: Choose the car that suits you
step1Text: Stay ready for every adventure. Quick service, reliable cars, and effortless booking — wherever the road takes you.
step2Text: Experience freedom on every mile. Clean, comfortable, and stylish cars built to match your lifestyle and destination.
step3Text: Enjoy seamless journeys with cars designed for comfort, safety, and performance — because every trip should feel easy.
step4Text: From start to finish, your comfort matters. Easy pick-up, transparent pricing, and a ride that fits your journey perfectly.
varietyBrandsText: Choose from a wide selection of top car brands — from compact city cars to luxury SUVs, we’ve got the perfect vehicle for your lifestyle.
maximumFreedomText: Rent without limits — flexible plans, no hidden fees, and complete control over your schedule. Drive your way, wherever you go.
awesomeSupportText: Our team is here 24/7 to assist you on the road. Whether it’s a quick question or urgent help, we’re always one call away.
flexibilityText: Book, modify, or extend your rental anytime from your phone. We make it easy to adapt your trip as your plans change.
memoriesTitle: Unlock unforgettable memories on the road
memoriesText: Discover the freedom of travel with our premium car rentals. Whether it’s a weekend getaway or a long journey, every ride becomes a story worth remembering.
check1: Enjoy every mile with modern, well-maintained cars built for comfort and safety.
check2: Reserve your car in minutes — online or on your phone — and start your journey hassle-free.
check3: Every vehicle in our fleet is regularly serviced and road-ready for any adventure.
check4: We care about your experience. Our team is always here to make your trip smooth and memorable.
lookingForCarText: Find the perfect ride — fast pickup, clean cars, no surprises. Drive in comfort, wherever the road takes you.
review1Text: Everything went smoothly! The car was clean, modern, and ready on time. It made our weekend trip so much easier — highly recommend!
review2Text: Fantastic service! Booking was very quick, and the staff was friendly and responsive. This is now my favorite car rental company.
review3Text: Enjoyed the experience! The car performed perfectly, and support helped immediately with any questions. I will definitely rent again.
